      • logIn

        public int logIn(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Checks if user is already registered to use backup application
        Specified by:
        logIn in interface Auth
        Parameters:
        username - - user's inputted username
        password - - user's inputted password
        Returns:
        -1 for an error, 0 for username / password mismatch, 1 for success, 2 for user doesn't exits

      • register

        public int register(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Allow new user to register for the application
        Specified by:
        register in interface Auth
        Parameters:
        username - - user's inputted username
        password - - user's inputted password
        Returns:
        -1 for error, 0 for fail due to username being taken, 1 for successful registration, 2 for invalid username, 3 for invalid password.

        Parameters:
        username - - username to be checked for existence
        Returns:
